question: In {teacher}'s class of {total} students, {p1}% of the class are {group1}. Out of the remaining class, {p2}% of the students are {group2} or part of {group3}. These 3 groups of students will need to leave early today to travel to an away {event}. Half of the {group1} are absent for being sick. Also, 3 cheerleaders will accompany each of these groups. How many students are leaving early to the {event}?
